original_text: “‘If a man has sexual relations with an animal, he is to be put to death, and you must kill the animal.
korean_text: 남자가 짐승과 교합하면 반드시 죽이고 너희는 그 짐승도 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: If a man has sexual relations with an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 동물과 성관계를 맺으면

sentences.original_text: he is to be put to death
and you must kill the animal
